 Promotion for new PFC subscribers in March, 2014 1. Eligibility: New PFC starter kits ( VND0 starter kits ) which are activated and first loaded from 24th to 31st March, 2014 . New PFC starter kits ( M0 ) which are activated and loaded from 20th to 28th February, 2014. PFC starter kits activated from 24th to 31st March, 2014 and issued before 23th March, 2014 remaining at MobiFone's agencies/stores that have the main balance of more than VND0 after deducting the subscription fee. 2. Content: Promotion for the first top-up during the promotion period after successful activation. NOT eligible for PFC starter kit (M0) Top-up value Bonus data added in Data1 credit Days of data use VND5.000 25 MB According to the days of use of the main credit VND10.000 50 MB VND20.000 100 MB VND30.000 150 MB VND50.000 250 MB VND100.000 500 MB VND200.000 1 GB VND300.000 1.5 GB VND500.000 2.4GB Periodically promotion: Bonus 500MB added to TK2 credit/30 days for 12 times from the following month of the month of successful activation. Condition to receive the bonus 500MB in month n+1: subscribers have to reload at least VND30.000 in the month n. Eligibility to receive bonus: as regulated Other regulations are applies as PFC subscription's regulations 2014&#24180;03&#26376; &#26032; &#21457;&#23637; PFC &#21495;&#30721;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; PFC (M0) &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796;. &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#51032; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201; PFC&#51032; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552; &#44228;&#51221; 1&#50640; &#47924;&#47308;&#51228;&#44277;&#50857;&#47049; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036; 5.000 25 MB &#51452;&#44228;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#51060;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036; 10.000 50 MB 20.000 100 MB 30.000 150 MB 50.000 250 MB 100.000 500 MB 200.00 1 GB 300.000 1.5 GB 500.000 2.4GB &#51452;&#44592;&#51201;&#51064; &#54812;&#53469; : &#49457;&#44277;&#51201;&#51004;&#47196; &#44032;&#51077;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#50672;&#49549; 12 &#44060;&#50900; &#51060;&#45236;&#50640; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552; &#44228;&#51221; 2 &#50640; &#47588;&#50900; 500MB &#47484; &#51228; &#44277;&#46108;&#45796; . ( &#44032;&#51077;&#54624; &#46412;&#48512;&#53552; &#45796;&#51020; &#45804;&#50640; &#51228;&#44277;&#46108;&#45796;), &#45796;&#51020; &#45804;&#50640; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#46020;&#47197; &#51060;&#48264; &#45804;&#51032; &#52649;&#51204;&#44552;&#50529;&#51008; 30.000 &#46041;&#51060;&#49345; &#51060;&#50612;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#47924;&#47308;&#51228;&#44277;&#45936;&#51060;&#53552;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#54616;&#45716; &#51312;&#44148;: &#54788;&#51137;&#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#54620;&#45796;. &#44592;&#53440; &#44508;&#51221;&#51008; PFC &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#51652;&#54665;&#46108;&#45796; . &#6050;&#6039;&#6071;&#6044;&#6028;&#6098;&#6029;&#6035;&#6093;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078; PFC &#6017;&#6082; 03/2014 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102;​ &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; PFC (M0) &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 24/03 - 31/03/2014 &#6100; &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; PFC (M0) &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; TKC >0đ&#6100; 2. &#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;(&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6033;&#6072; 1) &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6081;&#6021;&#6100; PFC &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078; Data 5.000đ 25 MB &#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043;
